txt.en:
'My nephew Bori has come up with a daring plan, [placeholder]. He conceived a diversionary strike against a certain hall in the Deeps to draw the Orcs of the White Hand from their camp; this way a second group could enter the camp and defeat its leader.

'It will be dangerous, for both groups, but it is a good plan. Imagine it: with one axe-blow, we will cut off the head of the White Hand presence in Moria! Bósi's fears will be assuaged in the face of such a victory.

'Will you help my nephew Bori with the preparations for this strike? He grieves still for Bróin, and feels that he must earn honour doubly: for himself, and for my slain son. If this strike is successful, he will have done so.'
'Thank you for helping me with the preparations, [placeholder]. I am almost ready, but...nay, it's nothing. I am ready.'
'Speak to my nephew Bori here and aid him with the preparations for his attack on the White Hand Orcs, [placeholder].'
Brogur has told you that his nephew Bori has come up with a daring plan that might accelerate the successful reclamation of Khazad-dûm by the dwarves.

Bori is in the Chamber of Leadership, off the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek, with Brogur.\n\nBrogur has told you that his nephew Bori has devised a daring plan to strike a blow against the White Hand Orcs in Moria, and wants you to help him with his preparations.
Bori is in the Chamber of Leadership, off the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou have helped Bori prepare for his daring strike on the White Hand, and should now report to him.
